name: Event Finds
overview:
Built by event industry professionals who happen to be budget brides, eventfinds.com is the first website that allows consumers to find quality vendors with last minute deals on un-booked dates or list special promotions.

What makes the site unique is it helps members no matter what kind of event they’re planning: wedding, anniversary, baby shower, sweet sixteen, graduation, birthday, corporate or any other event you can think of. It allows vendors to tap into new markets as well.

Almost every vendor has un-booked dates, but there was no place to promote them specifically and to a large targeted audience. Only quality, experienced vendors are listed after they fill out an application and are approved. On eventfinds.com each vendor lists their un-booked dates or special promotions at a pre-negotiated price. Members sign up to view their exclusive deals for free and contact them directly to ask questions and book the deal. Event finds members are “savvy savers,” people who like the finer things in life, but also love a great deal!

The site benefits both vendors and people planning an event, keeping the process of booking as easy as possible and creating lifetime relationships!
